subject: Horse Racing
American Pharoah (Race Horse)
lead_paragraph: Keen Ice edged American Pharoah at Saratoga Race Course, known as the Graveyard of Champions, where iconic horses like Gallant Fox, Affirmed and Secretariat had lost.
snippet: Keen Ice edged American Pharoah at Saratoga Race Course, known as the Graveyard of Champions, where iconic horses like Gallant Fox, Affirmed and Secretariat had lost.
